flawed_nl_solution:
Tony and Dean together read 23 + 12 = <<23+12=33>>33 books
3 of these books were duplicates so Tony and Dean together read 33 - 3 = <<33-3=30>>30 unique books
All three read 30 + 17 = <<30+17=47>>47 books
Because the books are being counted three times, the book is counted 3 - 1 = <<3-1=2>>2 extra times.
All together they have read 47 - 2 = <<47-2=45>>45 different books
#### 45

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 33. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
